data.title: Dari Language Training
data.meta_description: B-roll of service members participating in a Dari language training program in Afghanistan. Language Frago 10-332 mandates that as of November 1st, all Department of Defense civilians and U.S. service members in Afghanistan will take language and culture training. A basic Dari course is already in place on the new Kabul compound. Produced by Spc. Julia Marshall. Also available in high definition
